channel.title: How do i make capes have emotes if i wear them?
channel.description:
how do i make capes have emotes if i wear them?????
umm, well ya, so if u no how, like id like to no, ive tried everything lol

item.title: How do i make capes have emotes if i wear them?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

this is an example using the "yes" emote button [code case 168: //Yes Emote if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == ####){ setAnimation(####); stillgfx(###, absY, absX); } else if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == ####){ setAnimation(####); stillgfx(###, absY, absX);
replace ALL of the ####s with the numbers you need
theres only 2 emotes there, but use them(the “else” one(continuation)) to make more
post for more help

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make capes have emotes if i wear them?
